question:
[Rosa] ordered a pizza on Friday to share with her daughter [Margaret]. [Rosa]'s brother [Christian] showed up unexpectedly and ate most of the pizza. [Sean] and his son [Christian] went to look at cars. [Sean] ended up buying the Mustang. [Seth] 'son, [Stephen], aced his math class and made his father proud. [Stephen] took his daughter [Margaret] to the park that afternoon to play.
Question: How is [Sean] related to [Seth]?
